Uses of Class
com.github.triceo.splitlog.LogWatchBuilder

  • Packages that use LogWatchBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.github.triceo.splitlog  

    • Uses of LogWatchBuilder in com.github.triceo.splitlog

      Methods in com.github.triceo.splitlog that return LogWatchBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LogWatchBuilder LogWatchBuilder.closingAfterReading()
      Change the default behavior of the future log watch to close the watched file after each reading.
      static LogWatchBuilder LogWatchBuilder.forFile(File f)
      Used to construct a LogWatch for a particular log file.
      LogWatchBuilder LogWatchBuilder.ignoringPreexistingContent()
      Change the default behavior of the future log watch so that the existing contents of the file is ignored and only the future additions to the file are reported.
      LogWatchBuilder LogWatchBuilder.limitCapacityTo(int size)
      Limit capacity of the log watch to a given amount of messages.
      LogWatchBuilder LogWatchBuilder.withDelayBeforeTailingStarts(int length, TimeUnit unit)
      Specify the delay between when the log tailing is requested and when it is actually started.
      LogWatchBuilder LogWatchBuilder.withDelayBetweenReads(int length, TimeUnit unit)
      Specify the delay between attempts to read the file.
      LogWatchBuilder LogWatchBuilder.withDelayBetweenSweeps(int length, TimeUnit unit)
      Specify the delay between attempts to sweep the log watch from unreachable messages.
      LogWatchBuilder LogWatchBuilder.withMessageAcceptanceCondition(SimpleMessageCondition condition)
      Only the messages for which SimpleMessageCondition.accept(Message) is true will be registered by the future log watch.
      LogWatchBuilder LogWatchBuilder.withReadingBufferSize(int bufferSize)
      Specify the buffer size that will be used for reading changes made to the watched file.
